title: Have You Seen Lenny Kravitz’s Sunglasses?
text:
The pair in question. Photo: Jim Spellman/FilmMagic

When was the last time you saw Lenny Kravitz without sunglasses? Years? Decades? The man even posed for this 2018 Hollywood Reporter spread … wearing sunglasses … indoors. It’s like seeing a brunette Reese Witherspoon — it simply isn’t right! So, it’s obvious then why he would resort to a Twitter APB to find a beloved pair of lost shades. The musician/legend/father to a legend tweeted that he lost a vital pair at his concert at The Shrine in Los Angeles Sunday night. “They are incredibly sentimental to me, they are vintage and they belonged to a family member,” he wrote. “Hoping to get them back, no questions asked.” Persons with any information regarding the glasses can reach out to him at a specific hotline: kravitzglasses@gmail.com. You gotta respect Kravitz’s faith in humanity that he thinks he’ll actually receive helpful tips and not nudes. But listen, haven’t we all ended up home after a crazy night missing something wholly necessary like a necklace or keys or a sense of self? Help a brother out!

I’m missing this pair of sunglasses after my show in LA at the Shrine this weekend. They are incredibly sentimental to me, they are vintage and they belonged to a family member. Hoping to get them back, no questions asked. Any information please email kravitzglasses@gmail.com pic.twitter.com/vXQY1ZKD1i — Lenny Kravitz (@LennyKravitz) September 23, 2019
description: Lenny Kravitz needs your help to find his missing sunglasses. The musician tweeted out a call to action and how to reach him with information.
